List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

Source: R/crandb-public-api.R, R/print.R
cran_events.Rd

List of all CRAN events (new, updated, archived packages)

cran_events(releases = TRUE, archivals = TRUE, limit = 10, from = 1)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
summary(object, ...)

# S3 method for cran_event_list
print(x, ...)

Arguments

releases

Whether to include package releases.
archivals

Whether to include package archivals.
limit

Number of events to list.
from

Where to start the list, for pagination.
object

Object to summarize.
...

Additional arguments are ignored currently.
x

Object to print.

Value

List of events.

Examples

cran_events()
#> CRAN events (events)-----------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When     Package      Version    Title                                      
#>  + 3 hours  kohonen      3.0.10     Supervised and Unsupervised Self-Organis...
#>  + 3 hours  atable       0.1.4      Create Tables for Reporting Clinical Tri...
#>  + 4 hours  rbiouml      1.9        Interact with BioUML Server                
#>  + 4 hours  lillies      0.2.5      Estimation of Life Years Lost              
#>  + 6 hours  CovTools     0.5.3      Statistical Tools for Covariance Analysi...
#>  + 6 hours  quanteda     1.5.2      Quantitative Analysis of Textual Data      
#>  + 6 hours  sptm         2019.11-25 SemiParametric Transformation Model Meth...
#>  + 7 hours  IPDFileCheck 0.6.0      Basic Functions to Check Readability, Co...
#>  + 13 hours lcc          1.0.3      Longitudinal Concordance Correlation       
#>  + 14 hours MLeval       0.1        Machine Learning Model Evaluation          
cran_events(limit = 5, releases = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (archivals)--------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When  Package  Version Title                                                
#>  - 1 day vegtable 0.1.4   Handling Vegetation Data Sets                        
#>  - 1 day superml  0.4.0   Build Machine Learning Models Like Using Python's ...
#>  - 1 day simGWAS  0.2.0-2 Fast Simulation of Large Case-Control GWAS Summary...
#>  - 1 day regsel   0.2     Variable Selection and Regression                    
#>  - 1 day WHO      0.2.1   R Client for the World Health Organization API       
cran_events(limit = 5, archivals = FALSE)
#> CRAN events (pkgreleases)------------------------------------------------------
#>  . When    Package  Version Title                                           
#>  + 3 hours kohonen  3.0.10  Supervised and Unsupervised Self-Organising Maps
#>  + 3 hours atable   0.1.4   Create Tables for Reporting Clinical Trials     
#>  + 4 hours rbiouml  1.9     Interact with BioUML Server                     
#>  + 4 hours lillies  0.2.5   Estimation of Life Years Lost                   
#>  + 6 hours CovTools 0.5.3   Statistical Tools for Covariance Analysis       
summary(cran_events(limit = 10))
#> CRAN events (events)
#>  [1] "kohonen@3.0.10"     "atable@0.1.4"       "rbiouml@1.9"       
#>  [4] "lillies@0.2.5"      "CovTools@0.5.3"     "quanteda@1.5.2"    
#>  [7] "sptm@2019.11-25"    "IPDFileCheck@0.6.0" "lcc@1.0.3"         
#> [10] "MLeval@0.1"
